com.magicbinder.criterias.base

Class CriteriaExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magicbinder.criterias.base.CriteriaExpression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICriteria, java.io.Serializable

    public class CriteriaExpression
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, ICriteria
    CriteriaExpression. An array of Criterion and CriteriaExpression. Used for db requests. A CriteriaExpression represents the WHERE clause of a request.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
